summary:
Experienced Manager ; Commercial, Sales Director and general manager with a demonstrated history of working in the food & beverages industry both Foodservice as well as retail and the wholesale business. 
Strong business development professional skilled in negotiations, commercial both marketing and sales management, coaching, foodservice, retail and people management.

My personality characterizes as entrepreneurial, results oriented, team player, passionate with a 'getting it done' mentality. My focus is on building and maintaining good relationships with (internal) customers and environment on the one hand and providing insight into the sales process and the results on the other hand. I can quickly analyze at strategic level in order to roll out and execute efficient with my team.
I am an open personality and like to achieve results with the team. 
Large experience in both sales and marketing in foodservice and retail both both at supplier and retailer/wholesaler level.

TerraSana levert al meer dan 30 jaar biologische plantaardige voedingsproducten aan de biologische groothandels en winkels in meer dan 40 landen waarbij de focus op Nederland, Duitsland, België, Frankrijk en Spanje ligt.

In deze rol ben ik P&L eind verantwoordelijk.
profile_positions.title: Directeur

profile_positions.description:
Zorgboodschap is een online supermarkt voor de gezondheidszorg en detailhandel en bezorgt boodschappen, maaltijden en huishoudelijke artikelen in zowel kleine als grote verpakkingen. Zorgboodschap is onderdeel van Boon Food Group, een toonaangevend familiebedrijf met ruim 125 jaar aan ervaring in de levensmiddelenbranche en lid van Superunie.

In deze functie ben ik verantwoordelijk voor onder andere: operatie, ICT, HR, Finance en Inkoop.

Bekijk de website voor meer informatie: www.zorgboodschap.nl
profile_positions.title: Algemeen directeur

profile_positions.description:
Verscentrum Nederland is in 2013 opgericht en focust zich op het bezorgen van boodschappen (zowel retail als foodservice producten), maaltijden en maaltijd componenten in de kleinschalige zorg en retail. 

Zorgboodschap is een onderdeel van Verscentrum Nederland.

Zorgboodschap, als de boodschap zorg is. Zorgboodschap ontwikkelt zich van online supermarkt voor de zorg naar totaalleverancier voor de zorg. De totaaloplossing voor uw zorgorganisatie. Zorgboodschap verzorgt én bezorgt uw boodschappen voor eten en drinken, van 1-persoons- tot multiporties en van dieetafleidingen tot medische voeding. Daarnaast kunt u bij ons terecht voor uw huishoudelijke artikelen, medische disposables, kantoorbenodigdheden, incontinentiemateriaal en professionele schoonmaakmiddelen.

Meer informatie: www.zorgboodschap.nl, info@zorgboodschap.nl 

Binnen VCN, dochter onderneming van Boon Food Group, ben ik verantwoordelijk voor sales, marketing en inkoop.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
In this role I am responsible to define a strategy for our Western Europe activities, defined in channels, products, customers and brands. And also implement the strategy together with the local foodservice teams in the markets.
As Arla stopped the regional activities and went back to a country per country team I decided to explore outside Arla Foods.

Following countries: Germany, Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg and France
Products: both fresh and long life (UHT) products like milk, butter, yoghurt, cream, quark
Branded and non branded business: Arla, Lurpak, Castello, MUH, Melkunie
profile_positions.title: Foodservice Director Consumer Central Europe

profile_positions.description:
At Arla Foods Netherlands I'm responsible for the Out of Home team.
In my team I have 1 key account manager, 3 account managers and 1 sales assistant.

We operate within following 4 channels:
1) institutions (hospitals, elderly homes and nursing homes)
2) horeca (hotels, lunchrooms, conference locations and coffee bars)
3) caterers (contract or free locations)
4) on the move (petrol, railway, airports)

Account management takes care of institutional  end customers. The key account manager is responsible for relationships and sales at all headquarters at on the move, horeca and caterers. And besides being responsible for the team I also manage and develop the relationships with the wholesalers.

Our products, fresh dairy, long life dairy, cheese and butter, are all distributed by wholesalers.

Following brands are sold: Melkunie, Arla, Milk & Fruit, Breaker, Lurpak, Castello, Arla Apetina.

I'm both budget and turn over responsible.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Out of Home Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
As Sales Manager Food I'm responsible for the total sales business of Nestle Professional with our 4 food brand, MAGGI, CHEF, BUITONI & DAVIGEL. I'm both budget and turnover responsible. 

In my team I had 2 Account Managers, 1 Field Sales Manager and 10 Sales representatives.

The Account Managers represent us and focus on business growth at our Wholesalers (distributors like Deli XL, Sligro and Hanos) and at Key Accounts such as International caterers like Sodexo and Compass but also Hotel/Restaurant accounts like ACCOR, Golden Tulip.

The Field Sales Manager works closely with his 10 sales persons.  They focus daily on the users of our products in our core channels:
1) Institutional channel (hospitals, elderly homes)
2) Horeca (individual and chain hotels & restaurants)
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Food

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the sales force who visit  our users (chef cook or head of buying departments), daily. This team of 10 sales persons is divided into 2 groups. They focus daily on the users of our products in our core channels and have to achieve growth in 2 different channels:
1) Institutional channel (hospitals, elderly homes) - 6 sales reps
2) Horeca (individual and chain hotels & restaurants) - 4 sales reps
profile_positions.title: Field Sales Manager Food

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible to coach 4 new sales representatives in a a for Nestle FoodServices new channel and to make sure that we achieved our turnover and profit target in the first year to make sure that we could continue with this channel. 
And besides coaching people I was responsible for the acquisition of new gastronomy restaurant and hotel chains. Make deals so we could do business with them. 
Also take care of the relationship for the headoffices of hotels, like Accor, NH, Golden Tulip with a turnover growth as a goal.
profile_positions.title: Field Manager Horeca at Nestle FoodServices

From making targets and finalizing route to market untill attracting 4 new sales persons to do the daily sales work.
